title: old school hip hop gothic fonts
content:
Hi everebody, I search the name of this two gothic fonts  
who was very use by the old school hip hop in the 80's.

Thanks a lot.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100311192302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gothic%20fonts_5052.jpg)
author: Primo

comments.content: I believe these may have been custom drawn.

...it's sad. I search absolutely one of this fonts.  
I believe that it's perhaps medieval types...

thanks
